resources.string: Purpose of activity: allows user to browse songs, artists or albums
Purpose of activity: displaying details about the artist
Purpose of activity: playing songs and displaying details about the them.

This application will use SoundCloud API. To play tracks I will use MediaPlayer Class and MediaController. lLibraries to use: com.google.code.gson:gson:2.8.0 com.squareup.retrofit2:retrofit:2.1.0 com.squareup.retrofit2:converter-gson:2.1.0 com.squareup.picasso:picasso:2.5.2
Purpose of activity: displaying details about the album
